effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.
